meanings.sent1: She enjoys complementing her outfit with a matching scarf.
meanings.sent2: Adding a touch of salt can complement the flavors of the dish.
meanings.sent3: The artist was complementing the painting with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was like complementing sunshine on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The final piece of the puzzle was complementing the whole picture perfectly.

meanings.definition: To go well with or enhance something else
meanings.sent1: The red shoes are complementing her dress beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The music was complementing the romantic atmosphere of the evening.
meanings.sent3: The flowers were complementing each other in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like complementing music to his ears.
meanings.sent5: The spices were complementing the flavors of the soup, making it delicious.
